title: Fujairah Beachfront Opulence 90 Minutes From Dubai with Daily Breakfast & Return Airport Transfers
description:
Forget everything you thought you knew about beachfront escapes - this elegant hideaway is where desert meets ocean in the most spectacular way possible. Perched in front of pristine coastline, this Arabian paradise stuns with crystal-clear waters and panoramic views that will leave you speechless.

By day, dive into one of four temperature-controlled pools, take time to unwind in the wonderfully pampering O Spa by L'Occitane, or park up in a cabana on Al Aqah Beach. By night, feast your way through regional and international cuisines across five restaurants and bars, or take a moonlit stroll along the shore with the warm evening breeze and your favourite people to keep you company.
location_description: InterContinental Fujairah Resort, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: Al Aqah Beach, Dibba Road, Al Aqah, Fujairah, United Arab Emirates

title: InterContinental Fujairah Five-Star Resort on Al Aqah Beach
description: Masterfully placed between the jagged Hajar Mountains and the vast Arabian Sea, InterContinental Fujairah Resort, an IHG Hotel, offers sophisticated five-star luxury on the flawless sands of Al Aqah Beach. Celebrating sand and sea through a masterful palette of whites, yellows and soft blues, this UAE oasis has it all - feast your way across three excellent restaurants and bars, indulge with a visit to O Spa by L’Occitane or laze the day away by one of the four daydream-worthy swimming pools.
location_description: InterContinental Fujairah Resort, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: Al Aqah Beach, Dibba Road, Fujairah, United Arab Emirates

title: Fujairah Self-Contained Studios & Apartments near the Gulf of Oman with Sprawling Outdoor Pool
description:
Framed by the dramatic Hajar Mountains on one side and the beyond-blue Gulf of Oman on the other, this central city escape is your launchpad for uncovering Fujairah’s treasures.

Start your days with a buffet breakfast of international flavours before sweating it out at the onsite gym. Later, cool off in the sprawling outdoor pool that overlooks the city skyline.

Each studio and apartment offers a self-contained oasis to return to after exploring Al Hail Fort, Fujairah Fort, Al Bithna Castle or UAE’s oldest mosque, Al Bidya.
offer_address: Hamad Bin Abdullah Road, Fujairah City Centre, United Arab Emirates

title: Central Fujairah City Break with Outdoor Pool & Speakeasy Bar
description:
Experience the coastal allure of the UAE with a stylish retreat in Fujairah, nestled along the Gulf of Oman. Only an hour from dynamic Dubai, this sophisticated hotel is the perfect launchpad for exploring the region's history and culture. Spend your days lounging by the outdoor pool, complete with views of the city and the mountains beyond.

When it's time to explore, visit the stunning Fujairah Fort, stroll along the Fujairah Corniche and indulge in retail therapy at the nearby mall. After a day of adventures, return to your hotel for delicious sips at the Prohibition Era-themed speakeasy bar, hidden behind a bookcase.
offer_address: Hamad Bin Abdullah Road, Fujairah City Center, Fujairah 2751, United Arab Emirates

title: 5-Star United Arab Emirates Beachfront Escape with Three Restaurants, Pool Bar & Spa
description:
With the rugged Al Hajar Mountains as its backdrop and overlooking the lush waters of the Gulf of Oman, this five-star sun-soaked UAE sanctuary is the perfect launchpad for exploring Fujairah’s stunning cultural and heritage sites. Discover a destination lauded for its natural beauty, with fascinating archeological and heritage sites all within easy reach.

From your private balcony, overlook the breathtaking Indian Ocean. Enjoy beach trips, spa access and splash in the beautifully patterned pools. Cool off with refreshing cocktails from the poolside Canvas Bar or Arena Sports Bar. Tuck into grilled seafood delicacies at the nautical-themed Copper Lobster and indulge in ‘MediterrAsian’ cuisine at Lava Dining.
offer_address: Fairmont Fujairah Beach Resort, Mina Al Fajer, Suwayfah, Al Fqait, Fujairah, United Arab Emirates
